de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound
Class GridLayoutShape

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.AbstractShape
      de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound.AbstractLayoutShape
          de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.compound.GridLayoutShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdjustableShape, Paintable, Shape
public class GridLayoutShape
extends AbstractLayoutShape
implements AdjustableShape

A grid layout organizes multiple "column layouts" to a two dimensional grid.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

adjust

public void adjust(Graphics2D graphic)
Description copied from interface: AdjustableShape
Recalculates the dimension and position of the implementor. Compound adjustable which contains other adjustable may need to invoke this method recursively.

Specified by:
adjust in interface AdjustableShape
Parameters:
graphic - Graphic context used for font measuring.
